Detailed Description

Reads country-by-country coordinates from a KML placemarks file.

Author:
v.lakshmanan

Member Function Documentation

static LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.dataset.CountryPolygons.asLatLonGrid ( Country[]  countries,
double  latres,
double  lonres 
) [static] 

00121                                                                                              {
00122         int nrows = (int) Math.round(180 / latres);
00123         int ncols = (int) Math.round(360 / lonres);
00124         LatLon nwCorner = new LatLon(90,-180);
00125         LatLonGrid result = new LatLonGrid(nrows, ncols, -1, nwCorner, latres, lonres);
00126         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i){
00127             for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00128                 LatLon pt = result.getLocation(i, j);
00129                 result.setValue(i,j, result.getMissing());
00130                 for (int c = 0; c < countries.length; ++c){
00131                     if (countries[c].contains(pt)){
00132                         result.setValue(i, j, c);
00133                         break;
00134                     }
00135                 }
00136             }
00137             System.out.println("row " + i + " computed.");
00138         }
00139         return result;
00140     }

00169                 System.out.println("Location " + city + " is in " + countries[country]);

00171                 System.out.println("Location " + city + " is unclaimed");

static Country [] edu.ou.asgbook.dataset.CountryPolygons.readKml ( File  file  )  throws Exception [static]

reads data from a File.

The File can be gzipped or uncompressed.
